footer.made_by: Dev by Yago & Design by Pierre

about.title: Who we are?
about.content: Webmardi is a Swiss-based association that organises free monthly events in western Switzerland. We offer the opportunity for people to meet their local community and bring together developers, designers, project owners, founders & many more.

events.title: Events
events.content: Let us know if you would like to speak at webmardi or a topic you would like hear about.

sponsors.title: Our amazing sponsors
sponsors.content: Thanks to our sponsors who help making these events happening and offering you beers.
